edautils.plot_categorical(df, size_inches=(5, 7))¶

Plot counts of categorical features :param df: dataframe containing data to be ploted :type df: dataframe :param size_inches: plot size in inches :type size_inches: tuple :param num_cols: number of columns in plot

Returns

plot

Return type

fig, ax
